00034     void KTPowerSpectrum::TakeFrequencySpectrum(const KTComplexVector& freqSpect)
00035     {
00036         delete fMagnitude;
00037         delete fPhase;
00038         fMagnitude = new TVectorD(freqSpect.GetMagnitude()->Sqr());
00039         fPhase = new TVectorD(*(freqSpect.GetPhase()));
00040         return;
00041     }
00042 
00043     void KTPowerSpectrum::TakeFrequencySpectrum(Int_t nBins, const Double_t* real, const Double_t* imag)
00044     {
00045         delete fMagnitude;
00046         delete fPhase;
00047         fMagnitude = new TVectorD(nBins);
00048         fPhase = new TVectorD(nBins);
00049 
00050         for (Int_t iBin=0; iBin<nBins; iBin++)
00051         {
00052             (*fMagnitude)[iBin] = real[iBin]*real[iBin] + imag[iBin]*imag[iBin];
00053             (*fPhase)[iBin] = atan2(imag[iBin], real[iBin]);
00054         }
00055         return;
00056     }
00057 
00058     Double_t KTPowerSpectrum::GetPowerAtFrequency(Double_t freq)
00059     {
00060         return (*fMagnitude)[(Int_t)(freq / fBinWidth)];
00061     }
00062 
00063     Double_t KTPowerSpectrum::GetPhaseAtFrequency(Double_t freq)
00064     {
00065         return (*fPhase)[(Int_t)(freq / fBinWidth)];
00066     }

00068 
00069     TH1D* KTPowerSpectrum::CreateMagnitudeHistogram() const
00070     {
00071         Double_t freqMult = 1.e-6;
00072         Int_t nBins = fMagnitude->GetNoElements();
00073         TH1D* hist = new TH1D("hPowerSpectrum", "Power Spectrum", nBins, -0.5*fBinWidth*freqMult, fBinWidth * ((Double_t)nBins-0.5) * freqMult);
00074         for (Int_t iBin=0; iBin<nBins; iBin++)
00075         {
00076             hist->SetBinContent(iBin+1, (*fMagnitude)[iBin]);
00077         }
00078         hist->SetXTitle("Frequency (MHz)");
00079         hist->SetYTitle("Power");
00080         return hist;
00081     }
00082 
00083     TH1D* KTPowerSpectrum::CreatePhaseHistogram() const
00084     {
00085         Double_t freqMult = 1.e-6;
00086         Int_t nBins = fPhase->GetNoElements();
00087         TH1D* hist = new TH1D("hPowerSpectrumPhase", "Power Spectrum Phase", nBins, -0.5*fBinWidth*freqMult, fBinWidth * ((Double_t)nBins-0.5) * freqMult);
00088         for (Int_t iBin=0; iBin<nBins; iBin++)
00089         {
00090             hist->SetBinContent(iBin+1, (*fPhase)[iBin]);
00091         }
00092         hist->SetXTitle("Frequency (MHz)");
00093         hist->SetYTitle("Phase");
00094         return hist;
00095     }
00096 
00097     TH1D* KTPowerSpectrum::CreatePowerDistributionHistogram() const
00098     {
00099         Double_t tMaxMag = -1.;
00100         Double_t tMinMag = 1.e9;
00101         for (Int_t iBin=0; iBin<fMagnitude->GetNoElements(); iBin++)
00102         {
00103             if ((*fMagnitude)[iBin] < tMinMag) tMinMag = (*fMagnitude)[iBin];
00104             if ((*fMagnitude)[iBin] > tMaxMag) tMaxMag = (*fMagnitude)[iBin];
00105         }
00106         if (tMinMag < 1. && tMaxMag > 1.) tMinMag = 0.;
00107         TH1D* hist = new TH1D("hPowerDistribution", "Power Distribution", 100, tMinMag*0.95, tMaxMag*1.05);
00108         for (Int_t iBin=0; iBin<fMagnitude->GetNoElements(); iBin++)
00109         {
00110             hist->Fill((*fMagnitude)[iBin]);
00111         }
00112         hist->SetXTitle("Power");
00113         return hist;
00114     }
